articles.author: Malcolm Owen
articles.title: Apple-Nvidia collaboration triples speed of AI model production - AppleInsider
articles.description: Apple's latest machine learning research could make creating models for Apple Intelligence faster, by coming up with a technique to almost triple the rate of generating tokens when using Nvidia GPUs.
articles.content: Apple's latest machine learning research could make creating models for Apple Intelligence faster, by coming up with a technique to almost triple the rate of generating tokens when using Nvidia GPUs.… [+2836 chars]
